definition: to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group
solve one problem only to find another cropping up
pinyin: an4 xia4 hu2 lu2 fu2 qi3 piao2

sentences.english: Put the small balls into the boiling water until they become flowing.
sentences.chinese: 把搓好的小丸子放入滾水中煮滾及浮起。

sentences.english: I expect to refloat at 0900 hours local time.
sentences.chinese: 我船預計在當地時間0900時可重新浮起。

sentences.english: Can you jettison cargo aft to refloat?
sentences.chinese: 你船能拋棄後面的貨物使船浮起嗎？

sentences.english: If one window in the group is moved, all other group windows are moved as well.
sentences.chinese: 如果組合中一個窗口被移動，其它窗口也一起浮起。

sentences.english: I expect to refloat when weather improves.
sentences.chinese: 我船預計在天氣好轉時能重新浮起。

sentences.english: If one window in the group is activated, all other group windows are raised as well.
sentences.chinese: 如果組合中一個窗口被激活，其它窗口也一起浮起。

sentences.english: I expect to refloat when tide rises.
sentences.chinese: 我船預計在漲潮時可重新浮起。

sentences.english: I expect to refloat when draft decreases.
sentences.chinese: 我船預計喫水減少時才能重新浮起。

sentences.english: Can you jettison cargo forward to refloat?
sentences.chinese: 你船能拋棄前面的貨物使船浮起嗎？

sentences.english: When do you expect to refloat?
sentences.chinese: 你船預計何時才能重新浮起？

sentences.english: He sees who it is he musters a smile.
sentences.chinese: 但等看清是誰之後，他的臉上浮起了微笑。

sentences.english: Agriculture looking way is far of figure, musters a a smile.
sentences.chinese: 農望着道遠去的背影，臉上浮起了一絲笑容。

sentences.english: Innovation and competitiveness don’t seem to float Obama’s boat.
sentences.chinese: 創新和競爭力似乎不能使奧巴馬的船浮起。

sentences.english: When the fat's boiled enough that no more tallow rises, throw out the boiling water.
sentences.chinese: 當不再有動物脂浮起來時，就可以把鍋裏的水倒掉。

sentences.english: Hurstwood looked up quizzically, the least suggestion of a smile hovering about his lips.
sentences.chinese: 赫斯渥探究地擡起頭來，嘴角浮起一絲笑影。

sentences.english: Love or missing, always in casual birth again big star to sank.
sentences.chinese: 愛或思念，總是在不經意間浮起，又寂寂地沉了下去。

definition: to float up/to rise to the surface/fig. to rise in the world
to flash through (one's mind)/to dodge (away from pursuers)
to well up/to boil out/to bubble forth/to spurt
to flit across/to sweep past/to glance (strike at an angle)
to appear before one's eyes/to come into view/to float into appearance/to come back (of images from the past)/to emerge/it emerges/it occurs (to me that..)
to raise one's head/to perk up
